title: 2bd 2ba, Subway tile kitchen backsplash, in Henderson NV
posting_body: ['South of Las Vegas, in picturesque Henderson, The Bristol at Sunset is everything you could ever want in an apartment community.', 'With proximity to everything from the nature preserves to the excitement, shopping, and entertainment of nearby casinos – when you live here, your most difficult decision will be how to spend your weekends.', '-Professional onsite management', '-Package locker with 24/7 access to packages', '-Exterior storage available', '-Resident social lounge', '-24-hour fitness center with free weights and cardio machines                                                                                         Featured amenity', '-Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)', '-Barbecue pavilions and picnic area', '-Private balcony or patio                                                                                        Featured amenity', '-Convenient access to public transportation', '-Separate dining area', '-Onsite playground', '-Fenced dog park with pet watering station', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Prices Change Daily', 'Flexible Lease Terms']
